verses.verse: Where are wars and arguments from among you? Aren't they from here, from your pleasures, the ones that serve in the military of your body parts?
You desire and do not have. You murder, are impassioned, and are not able to obtain. You argue and wage war. But you do not have because of the fact for you to not be asking.
You ask and do not receive because you ask in a bad way, so that you might spend it in your pleasures.
Cheating husbands and cheating wives, don't you realize that the friendship of the world is an enemy position of God? So whoever intends to be a friend of the world is placed as an enemy of God.
Or does it seem to you that the Old Testament writing meaninglessly says, "The spirit that resides in you yearns toward envy."
But He gives more generosity. For this reason, He says, "God places Himself in opposition to proud people, but gives generosity to lowly people."
So place yourselves under God. Stand in opposition to the Accuser, and he will escape away from you.
Come near to God, and He will come near to you. Clean your hands, sinful people, and consecrate your hearts, double-souled people.
Be troubled, grieve, and cry. Your laughter must be turned into grief and the happiness into dismay.
Put yourselves down low in the sight of the Master, and He will put you up high.
Don't criticize each other, brothers. The person criticizing a brother and judging his brother criticizes the law and judges the law. If you judge the law, you are not a doer of the law, but a judge.
There is one Lawmaker, the One who is able to rescue and to ruin. Who are you, the one who judges the different person?
Lead your attention here now, the people who say, "Today or tomorrow we will travel to the city here, do things there one year, travel among them, and make money,"

some who are not even aware of the content of the day tomorrow. You see, what kind of life is your life? You see, it is a fog, the kind that appears toward a little while, but following that disappears.
In place of that, there should be the "for you to be saying, 'If the Master wants, we will also live and do this or that'" thing.
But now you brag about your egos. All of this type of bragging is evil.
So to a person who knows to be doing a nice thing and does not do it, to him it is sin.
